resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107331</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107331</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209267</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dots, Ties, and Borrowed Divisions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punkte, Gleichheit und geborgte Abteilungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Points, cravates, et Divisions empruntées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pontos, laços, e divisões pedidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Puntini, legami e divisioni prese in prestito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημεία, δεσμοί, και δανεισμένα τμήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Puntos, lazos, y divisiones prestadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In written music, standard note lengths are always halves (or halves of halves, and so on) of other note lengths. To get any other note length, dots, ties, or borrowed divisions must be used.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In schriftlicher Musik sind Standardanmerkung 
Längen immer Hälften (oder Hälften von Hälften und so weiter) 
anderer Anmerkung Längen. Um jede mögliche andere Anmerkung 
Länge zu erhalten, müssen Punkte, Gleichheit oder geborgte 
Abteilungen verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la musique écrite, les longueurs standard de
note sont toujours des moitiés (ou des moitiés des moitiés, et 
ainsi de suite) d'autres longueurs de note. Pour obtenir 
n'importe quelle autre longueur de note, des points, les cravates, ou 
les divisions empruntées doivent être employés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na música escrita, os comprimentos padrão da 
nota são sempre metades (ou metades das metades, e assim por diante) 
de outros comprimentos da nota. Para começar todo o outro 
comprimento da nota, os pontos, os laços, ou as divisões pedidas 
devem ser usados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nella musica scritta, le lunghezze standard della 
nota sono sempre metà (o metà delle metà ed e così via) di altre 
lunghezze della nota. Per ottenere qualunque altra lunghezza 
della nota, i puntini, i legami, o le divisioni prese in prestito 
devono essere usati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στη γραπτή μουσική, τα πρότυπα μήκη σημειώσεων είναι
πάντα μισά (ή μισά των μισών, και τα λοιπά) άλλων μηκών 
σημειώσεων. Για να πάρουν οποιοδήποτε άλλοδήποτε μήκος 
σημειώσεων, τα σημεία, οι δεσμοί, ή τα δανεισμένα τμήματα 
πρέπει να χρησιμοποιηθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En música escrita, las longitudes estándares de 
la nota son siempre mitades (o mitades de mitades, etcétera) de otras
longitudes de la nota. Para conseguir cualquier otra longitud de
la nota, los puntos, los lazos, o las divisiones prestadas deben ser 
utilizados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
